text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ زَادَهُمْ هُدًى وَءَاتَىٰهُمْ تَقْوَىٰهُمْ

translation.en.sahih: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan orang-orang yang mau menerima petunjuk, Allah menambah petunjuk kepada mereka dan memberikan balasan ketakwaannya.
